body.name: CUCKOO Air Oven | 18 Preset Modes, 360 Convectional Cooking, Premium Interior & Exterior, All accessories included Black/Stainless Steel CAFO-A2601S
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 39 mins
features: 6-in-1: Replace your convection oven, air fryer, microwave, toaster, dehydrator, and defroster with this versatile appliance that does it all and does it well. Maximize countertop space with this less than 1 cu. ft. wonder

18 Preset Cooking Modes: Access 18 modes with the press of a button, ranging from sweet to savory or soft to crispy. Make crunchy fries in 20 minutes or a full cake in 27 minutes. Explore endless options to properly fuel your busy day

Large Capacity: While we've designed the exterior to contribute to a spacious countertop, we've maximized the interior space to cook full family meals at once. Whip up 22 chicken wings or a 10 inch pizza for ultimate space and time savings

360 Convectional Cooking: 360 convectional cooking ensures small portions are made fast and large portions are cooked well. Produce crispy meals with 2 heating elements and a convection fan that optimizes air and heat flow

7 Accessories: Enjoy smart, versatile accessories with the Air Oven. Air fry meals to perfection with a mesh tray, oil tray, and fetch rack; roast a 3 star dinner with a rotisserie fork and bake tray. Refer to a recipe book for inspiration
body.description: This revolutionary Air Oven does it all! Completely revamp your kitchen and maximize space with our stainless steel, easy-to-clean appliance that executes everything from snacks to full family meals. A user-friendly control panel includes features that make it easy to adjust times and temperatures. If you want it to do the thinking, select from 18 preset cooking modes that cook everything from steak to bread while you tend to other tasks. Additionally, a dehydrate feature makes healthy snacks, like apple and banana chips — a multipurpose whiz. Make dinner even easier with an included recipe book featuring meals across all cooking modes. There's a world of cuisine in this compact, sleek oven that makes life easy and delicious.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Replace 6 kitchen appliances with one compact and versatile countertop oven! Countertop Air Fryer & Convection Oven 18 Preset Cooking Modes User-Friendly Dial & Button Controls with LED Display Stainless Steel Finish Recipe Book Included Double-Enforced Glass Door for Enhanced Heat Retention 120V AC

Supporting Images 95% LESS OIL THAN DEEP FRYING Make the more health-conscious choice by air frying all of your typically deep-fried favorites INTUITIVE CONTROLS With dial and button controls, easily choose between the 18 preset modes to begin cooking COUNTERTOP WONDER Highly functional, timelessly designed, all-in-one appliance easily fits in with every type of kitchen QUICK COOKING With powerful 1,700W and two heating elements, your meals will be cooked quicker than traditional ovens and air fryers

Supporting Images RACK POSITIONS Features two different rack positions to have the option of simultaneously cooking, baking, or air frying two different dishes UNLIMITED POSSIBILITES Your go-to kitchen tool to cook, bake, air fry, roast, toast, dehydrate, or broil—the mealtime possibilities are endless EASY TO CLEAN With its stainless steel exterior and dishwasher-safe accessories, clean-up is guaranteed to be a breeze ACCESSORIES INCLUDED Equipped with all accessories needed to create a delicious and effortless meal: baking pan, baking rack, rotisserie, fetch rack, crumb tray and air frying basket

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wrong temperature range advertised
reviews.reviewText: On the 4th picture of this product, it says the temperature range is 122 - 428 but it’s actually 140 - 400.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Returned, the item was so loud and fan runs for so long even after the units shut off!!!
